title: Stellar 2 Bedroom with Ensuite Bathroom plus more near North & Western
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Sunny updated 2 bedroom apartment near North and Western avenues  Master bedroom with remodeled ensuite bathroom customized shower suite  Bright living room with large skylight Open concept dining area to living room.  Sunny kitchen with quartz counters, stainless steel stove, refrigerator and dishwasher including breakfast bar.  Bonus area for additional breakfast nook, open office, or study area   Marble tiled bathroom with whirlpool tub  In unit apt washer and dryer.  Cork flooring throughout   Gorgeous flagstone patio, backyard and inviting garden  New back staircase/deck for private seating  Separate utilities  Tenant pays for central heat/ac & electric, cable/internet  No pets and no smoking No move in fee Application fee Security deposit
